name: TMA Solutions
overview:
TMA is a leading software outsourcing company in Vietnam with 1,200+ engineers and more than 15 years of experience in providing quality software services for many world leading companies such as Avaya, Alcatel-Lucent, Ericsson, Siemens, Genband, Amdocs, Nortel, NTT, NEC, Andrew, IBM, Flextronics, Juniper Networks, ShoreTel, etc.

Our main services are software development, customization, posting/migration, localization, software testing, mobile solutions and professional services.

About software testing services, TMA has experienced in large and complex software outsourcing projects as well as in full ownership of product verification. Some outstanding software testing services at TMA: test solution, planning and design; test execution and reporting; full product verification support.

We ensure the quality solutions with skillful engineering team (Hire only top 5% of candidates; 40% have overseas experience; All engineers can speak English).

Visit our website: www.tmasolutions.com Contact us: sales@tma.com.vn

offices.address1: 111 Nguyen Dinh Chinh, Phu Nhuan District, HCMC
